item.description:
We will join a culture vulture group with a heavy European component at bar/restaurant in Back Bay to knock down an attitude adjustment beverage or two.  We will have a separate space adjoining the (now full) bar and there will be food. As well as American popular standards music. There will be a $6 fee to cover food.

In addition to RSVPing Yes here, be sure to register at http://hubbub0319.eventbrite.com. That site will process your payment. If you are not registered you may not be admitted.

Questions? Call me at 781-729-3832 or email me at thurman@efr.bz
item.how_to_find_us: We will be in the room to the right of the bar

group.name: The Boston Euro Social Meetup Group

item.name: Afterwork social nearCopley Square
